title: I'm a high elo player who is drunk and smurfing on a Bronze account - looking for a duo to carry.
body:
Hey guys I'm a high elo player, I'm 29 years old, I want to drink and play League of Legends and drink and voice comms, talk shit and rek scrubs.

If this sounds like something you could be into add me on this account!



<3

Plz no haterooni cos smurf <3 (If you can't beat em, join em???) _ PLAYING ALL DAY TODAY 23/04/2016

replies.body:
im a big fan of "if u cant beat them, join them" 
help me get out of the bronze hole <3

> [{quoted}](name=The TeemoNator,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=yX0TRO3E,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-04-23T04:05:01.110+0000)
>
> Hey guys I&#039;m a high elo player, I&#039;m 29 years old, I want to drink and play League of Legends and drink and voice comms, talk shit and rek scrubs.
> 
> If this sounds like something you could be into add me on this account!
> 
> 
> 
> &lt;3
> 
> Plz no haterooni cos smurf &lt;3 (If you can&#039;t beat em, join em???) _ PLAYING ALL DAY TODAY 23/04/2016

Sadface. I miss the carry!!
I would ask for one but my main is silver elo and got banned for some reason and am trying to lvl my smurf, can i still add u so when im 30 we can duo?
Update  so far 3 wins 0 loss, the elo train is going Choo fucking Choo. I found James bond BTW dnb007

> [{quoted}](name=The TeemoNator,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=yX0TRO3E,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-04-23T04:05:01.110+0000)
>
> Hey guys I&#039;m a high elo player, I&#039;m 29 years old, I want to drink and play League of Legends and drink and voice comms, talk shit and rek scrubs.
> 
> If this sounds like something you could be into add me on this account!
> 
> &lt;3
> 
> Plz no haterooni cos smurf &lt;3 (If you can&#039;t beat em, join em???)

Hai, I am hot grill who is stuck in bronze. I main support but I can try to play any role. Plz carry me senpai! {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

I'm actually married. Hot grill workds against you if you're serious. But I'm pretty sure you're a troll as I haven't got an in game invite yet

my IGN = The  Teemonator.

I'll be on all night tonight - Really keen for someone to add me and play withe me - I'll even make a record of how many wins we get and post it on the forum etc.

Looking forward to having someone add me.

Just so we're clear - by high elo I mean Gold 1 currently, was Gold last season and Plat season 4.

Cheers
J!
